text:
National Journal (A property of Atlantic Media) | Senior Web Developer | Washington DC | Full-time ONSITE

My team is looking to add another senior dev. Our stack includes Django, Postgres, Nginx, Git, Jenkins, ElasticSearch, Mongo, and splatterings of much more.

It's a fun, chill place to work. Great work-life balance, lots of chances to try out whatever you'd like technology-wise, and good coworkers (3 devs, 1 PM, and a 5-foot tall stuffed banana).

Job description and application are posted at http://atlanticmedia.theresumator.com/apply/jobs/details/ZJ9...?

National Journal, the premium provider of insightful reporting, essential research and intelligence tools for those operating in Washingtonâ€™s policy and government arenas, seeks a Senior Web Developer to be jointly responsible for the successful delivery of digital products. The Senior Web Developer will be a key member of our team of developers and act as the architect of major digital projects while helping to ensure that the work completed by the development team is stable and efficient. This is not a management position, but responsibilities will include mentorship of junior colleagues.
